TopicTitle: OPT Vessel gots destroyed every Launch

Articles.Content:
Every time i try to launch a Vessel with OPT Parts, kraken destroyes the Vessel instant.

Is OPT Broken?

Are you using the latest version and the dependencies? (B9 part switch & the new cfg files?)

Incidentally, after upgrading B9 to the latest version on mine, it was forcing the game to close and was throwing a strange rcs error so double check the versions of everything just in case.
